trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Eagle Pass
There were no other sightings in Eagle Pass on or around January 12th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsAt exactly 6:35 p.m. A triangular object with three bright lights traveled from my 2 o'clock to my 9 o'clock position. No noise was heard and it dissapeared in a flash.
Summary: At exactly 6;35 p.m. my child and I witnessed a three bright lights in atriangular shape travel across the sky. It was visible for about 7 seconds and then it just vanished.
